title: 6A(5A) of the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 (No. 46
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Climate Action and Low Carbon
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Climate Action and Low Carbon 

Development Act 2015 (Greenhouse Gas Emissions) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited climate action low carbon development act 2015 (greenhouse gas emissions) regulation 2021

title: 6A(5A) of the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 (No. 46
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations –
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations – 

“Act” means the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 (No. 
46 of 2015); 

“Agency” means the Environmental Protection Agency; 

“Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2020/1044” means Commission 
Delegated Regulation (EU) 2020/1044 of 8 May 2020 supplementing Regulation 
(EU) 2018/1999 of the European Parliament and of the Council with regard to 
values for global warming potentials and the inventory guidelines and with 
regard to the Union inventory system and repealing Commission Delegated 
Regulation (EU) No 666/20142; 

“CRF” means the common reporting format tables amended from time to time 
by the Agency, published on the website of Agency and provided by the Agency, 
annually, to the United Nations under the UN reporting guidelines; 

“UN reporting guidelines” means the United Nations Framework Convention on 
Climate Change reporting guidelines on annual inventories for Parties included 
in Annex I to the Convention, adopted by Decision 24/CP. 19 of the Conference 
of the Parties at Warsaw on 22 November 2013. 

(2) A reference, in these Regulations, to Commission Delegated Regulation 
(EU) 2020/1044 means a reference to that Regulation, as amended from time to 
time. 

1 OJ No. L230, 17.7.2020, p.1. 
2 OJ No. L230, 17.7.2020, p.1. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th October, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [531] 3

title: 6A(5A) of the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 (No. 46
heading: 3. Emissions from the greenhouse gases specified in the CRF shall be taken
text_raw:
3. Emissions from the greenhouse gases specified in the CRF shall be taken 

into account for the purpose of – 

(a) 

the first 2 carbon budgets referred to in section 6A(5) of the Act, 
and 

(b) 

every carbon budget thereafter.
text_norm: 3 emission greenhouse gas specified crf shall taken account purpose - (a) first 2 carbon budget referred section 6a(5) act (b) every carbon budget thereafter

title: 6A(5A) of the Climate Action and Low Carbon Development Act 2015 (No. 46
heading: 4. The manner of calculating and accounting for the emissions (including
text_raw:
4. The manner of calculating and accounting for the emissions (including 

any reductions) referred to in Regulation 3 is specified – 

(a) 

in the UN reporting guidelines, 

(b) with regard to the global warming potential, in the Annex to 
Commission Delegated Regulation (EU) 2020/1044, and 

(c) with regard to the sources and sink categories, in the part of the 
CRF titled ‘Total CO2 equivalent emissions with land use, land 
use change and forestry’. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

12 October, 2021. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach.
